assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: JA and SC are employed by the commercial company Progenika Biopharma SA (Grifols, Derio, Spain). This does not alter the authors’ adherence to all the policies on sharing data and materials. The remaining authors declare no conflict of interest.
